name: EmailSoortCodelijst-to-ContactPointSystem
description: Maps EmailAddressType codes as found in HCIM ContactInformation (release 2017) to ContactPoint.system codes as found in FHIR STU3

target.comment: HP: Primary Home/Priv√© e-mailadres. email: The value is an email address. Use in conjunction with ContactPoint.use = home.
WP: Work Place/Zakelijk e-mailadres. email: The value is an email address. Use in conjunction with ContactPoint.use = work.
